Package ir.ac.kntu.service

Class MarketService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ir.ac.kntu.service.MarketService
  • public class MarketService
extends java.lang.Object
    MarketService class is a service class between Market class and other classes in this class not existed IO methods

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addMarket​(Market market)  
      java.util.ArrayList<Market> getListOfMarketByType​(MarketType marketType, java.lang.String marketName)
      this method get a Market type and a string for market's name, and then return a list of markets related to thr market type and the string.
      java.util.ArrayList<Market> getMarkets()  
      java.util.ArrayList<Market> searchByName​(java.lang.String nameSearching)
      this method get a string name for market's name and return a list of markets with the name.
      java.util.ArrayList<Market> searchProductByNameBestMarkets​(MarketType marketType, java.lang.String productName)
      this method get a product name, search between all markets and put markets that contain the product (for key), and rate of the product in that market (for value) to a hashmap, then entries of hashmap added to a list whit help of linked list class, and then sort the list whit helper class comparator, and the finally added key of enters of hashmap to a list and return it
      void updateMarket​(Market oldMarket, Market editedMarket, boolean status)
      this method get a old market and edited market and new status, then update old market whit edited data from edited market and new status.

        public java.util.ArrayList<Market> getListOfMarketByType​(MarketType marketType,
                                                         java.lang.String marketName)
        this method get a Market type and a string for market's name, and then return a list of markets related to thr market type and the string.
        Parameters:
        marketType - get a Market Type
        marketName - get a String for name
        Returns:
        a list of Markets

      • searchByName

        public java.util.ArrayList<Market> searchByName​(java.lang.String nameSearching)
        this method get a string name for market's name and return a list of markets with the name.
        Parameters:
        nameSearching - just return markets that contain this name
        Returns:
        a list of markets that contain the name

      • updateMarket

        public void updateMarket​(Market oldMarket,
                         Market editedMarket,
                         boolean status)
        this method get a old market and edited market and new status, then update old market whit edited data from edited market and new status.
        Parameters:
        oldMarket - changing this market's data
        editedMarket - change data from this market
        status - this is the new status of the market

      • searchProductByNameBestMarkets

        public java.util.ArrayList<Market> searchProductByNameBestMarkets​(MarketType marketType,
                                                                  java.lang.String productName)
        this method get a product name, search between all markets and put markets that contain the product (for key), and rate of the product in that market (for value) to a hashmap, then entries of hashmap added to a list whit help of linked list class, and then sort the list whit helper class comparator, and the finally added key of enters of hashmap to a list and return it
        Parameters:
        marketType - get a Market type for return this markets
        productName - get a product name
        Returns:
        a list of best markets that contain the product, list is sorted.
